page.title: 15RECREATION AND EVENTS
page.content: A RACE TRACK USED FOR PONY TROTTING AND HARNESS- RACING EVENTS IS LOCATED ON THE LAND OF POOL BRIDGE FARM NUN MONKTON. EVENTS TAKE PLACE WEEKLY DURING THE SUMMER PROMOTED BY YORK RACE WAYS. AT THE END OF THE SEASON PONY SALES TAKE PLACE. A VILLAGE GALA IS HELD IN SEPTEMBER, THIS YEAR BY THE PARENT-TEACHERS ASSOCIATION TO RAISE FUNDS FOR THE SCHOOL. THE YORK-AINSTY HUNT MEETS OUTSIDE THE ALICE HAWTHORN PUBLIC HOUSE. OTHER SOCIAL EVENTS TAKE PLACE IN THE SCHOOL. THERE IS A BRANCH OF THE YORKSHIRE COUNTRYWOMEN'S ASSOCIATION. A VILLAGE FOOTBALL TEAM PLAYS IN THE CLARO LEAGUE. THEY HAVE A FOOTBALL PITCH IN THE PARK. ANGLING RIGHTS ON THE OUSE ARE LET TO LEEDS DISTRICT AMALGAMATED SOCIETY. NO VILLAGERS OWN BOATS, VISITING BOATERS MOOR UNOFFICIALLY AT NIDD-MOUTH.
